mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.sku_id AS skuId, c.num, p.title, k.price, k.original_price AS originalPrice, k.vip_price AS vipPrice, k.title AS skuTitle, p.img AS spuImg, k.img AS skuImg, k.stock, k.spu_id AS spuId, p.category_id AS categoryId, c.created_time as createdTime, c.updated_time as updatedTime FROM lm_cart AS c, lm_sku AS k, lm_spu AS p WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} AND c.sku_id = k.id AND k.spu_id = p.id
